content: शोषण {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (णी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [शुष्-ल्यु ल्युट् वा] {@--1@} Drying up, desiccating. {@--2@} Causing to wither up, emaciating; <ls>Ś. 3. 10.</ls> --णः <ab>N.</ab> of one of the arrows of Cupid. --णं {@--1@} Drying up, desiccation. {@--2@} Suction, sucking up, absorption. {@--3@} Exhaustion. {@--4@} Emaciation, withering up. {@--5@} Dry ginger.
